modName: static ingots and ore for creation kit
summary: adds static ingots and ore to the world objects static part in the creation kit images are showing they don\'t move when i attack meaning they are static the Lightning magic has got nothing to do with the static part in this mod
descriptionHtml: adds static ingots and ore to the world objects static part in the creation kit if it doesn\'t work then get the skyrims texture bsa and take textures\\dungeons\\mines and the same with meshes\\dungeons\\mines\\ore from the skyrim meshes bsa
author: craigdown
